sources.content:
# âœ¨ Implicit formfactor

Show that you don't need to specify the formfactor or input+output params explicitly. Implementing the formfactor interface is sufficient.

-   PIPELINE URL https://promptbook.studio/examples/implicit-formfactor.book.md
